page.title: 16Local Amenities
page.content: {The Forest Stores}at Cadnam are the local Village general stores, including a Post Office. Outside the store is a letterbox and two litterbins. There is a bus stop there which serves the Hants and Dorset Bus Depot in Southampton. There are also three bicycle stands outside. The Forest Stores also used to be a bakery and is approximately eighty years old. A pharmacy is also included in the shop. {Lloyds Bank}is only open on Thursday morning. {Shell Garage}sells petrol, diesel and oil for cars. There are also cars for sale there. It has two petrol pumps and also does M.O.T. tests. It is served by the A.A. {Royal British Legion Club}meet in a green tin hall every Wednesday. There is a clock on top of the door.
